extensionDescription.message: Get categories of MediaWikis (e.g. Wikipedia, fandom.com) and find articles matching the categories by different criteria. Be aware: this AddOn performs background webrequests based on your input!

browserActionNoWiki.description: BroswerAction: alt-message when not on a MediaWiki page.

browserActionOpenPopupDetail.description: BroswerAction: open the Popup with a specific wiki.

browserActionAvailableCategories.description: BroswerAction: list title for current available categories.

popupNavOverview.description: Popup menu: navigation entry for overview.

popupNavShow.description: Popup menu: navigation entry for detailed wiki information.

popupLoading.description: Display loading while category data is fetched for the popup.

popupCategories.description: Popup display, number of categories saved for a Wiki.

popupDeleteAllText.message: This will delete all data from the extension. Are you sure?
popupDeleteAllText.description: Popup display, delete all confirmation text body.

popupPages.description: Popup display, number of pages saved for a Wiki.

popupMathResults.description: Popup display, results headline for math operations.

popupMathResultsNone.message: No results, please check your calculation.
popupMathResultsNone.description: Popup display, results headline for math operations with no results.

titleAND.message: An entry must be contained in both the left-hand list as well as in the category on the right.

titleOR.message: An entry can be contained either in the left-hand list or the category on the right, or both.

titleXOR.message: An entry must be contained either in the left-hand list or the category on the right, but not in both.

errorDialogTitle.description: Error: title of the dialog popup.

errorDialogOK.description: Error: accept-button text for the dialog popup.

errorCategoryAlreadySaved.description: Error: the requested category has been fetched already.

errorPopupCorruptedCategory.message: One or more categories of this wiki are corrupted. Please delete the wiki and save the categories again.
errorPopupCorruptedCategory.description: Error: a category is found to be corrupted.

errorWebReqFail.message: The requested webpage could not be loaded!
errorWebReqFail.description: Error: the requested web resource could not be loaded.
